title: Fork and code
description: We're happy about every new feature that someone brings to vocaluxe. So why don't you just start coding?

title: Translate
description: Want to help by translating vocaluxe into you native language? Or want to improve an existing one?

title: Find bugs
description: Help us to keep vocaluxe stable. If you find a bug, just open an issue in our GitHub issue tracker.
